message.content:
cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.NE, cs.RO, cs.CV

The paper describes a machine learning-based algorithm for hand gesture recognition using electromyography (EMG) signals. The algorithm is based on hyperdimensional (HD) computing, which is a subfield of machine learning and artificial intelligence. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves human-computer interfaces, which falls under the category of Human-Computer Interaction (HCI), and HD computing, which is a subfield of Neuromorphic Engineering (NE) and Robotics (RO). Additionally, the paper involves image processing techniques for EMG signal encoding, which falls under the category of Computer Vision (CV). Therefore, the likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.NE, cs.RO, cs.CV, ordered from most to least likely.
